title: Build fail: magma ppc64le: rhel8 and centos8: "__ieee128" is undefined
body:
`magma` build is failing using `spack@develop` (10-Aug, 1398038beead1a1532fc337165e2b6bf9d58c284) on:
* `RHEL 8` `ppc64le` `%gcc@8.3.1`
* `CentOS 8` `ppc64le` `%gcc@8.3.1`

Concrete spec for `magma` for RHEL8 ppc64le: [magma-ph5dkn.yml.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/5052396/magma-ph5dkn.yml.txt)
Build log: [magma-build-out.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/5052466/magma-build-out.txt)

```
$> spack install -f ./magma-ph5dkn.yml
...
==> Installing magma
==> magma: Executing phase: 'cmake'
==> magma: Executing phase: 'build'
...
>> 383    /usr/include/bits/floatn.h(79): error: identifier "__ieee128" is undefined
     384
  >> 385    /usr/include/bits/floatn.h(82): error: invalid argument to attribute "__mode__"
     386
  >> 387    /usr/include/bits/floatn.h(79): error: identifier "__ieee128" is undefined
     388
  >> 389    /usr/include/bits/floatn.h(82): error: invalid argument to attribute "__mode__"
     390
...
>> 451    /usr/include/bits/floatn.h(79): error: identifier "__ieee128" is undefined
     452
  >> 453    /usr/include/bits/floatn.h(82): error: invalid argument to attribute "__mode__"
     454
     455    2 errors detected in the compilation of "/tmp/tmpxft_00000991_00000000-6_zgemv_fermi.cpp1.ii".
     456    -- Removing /tmp/root/spack-stage/spack-stage-magma-2.5.3-2djtbcccmwffdamfiphremnxnk6nb6hw/spack-build/CMakeFiles/magma.dir/magmablas/./magma_generated_zgemv_fermi.cu.o
  >> 457    /usr/include/bits/floatn.h(79): error: identifier "__ieee128" is undefined
     458
  >> 459    /usr/include/bits/floatn.h(82): error: invalid argument to attribute "__mode__"
     460
     461    /spack/opt/spack/linux-rhel8-ppc64le/gcc-8.3.1/cmake-3.17.3-abbaqrgvorosacpyiawea5xeyjocb5hc/bin/cmake -E rm -f /tmp/root/spack-stage/spack-stage-magma-2.5.3-2djtbcccmwff
            damfiphremnxnk6nb6hw/spack-build/CMakeFiles/magma.dir/magmablas/./magma_generated_zgemv_fermi.cu.o
  >> 462    CMake Error at magma_generated_zgemv_fermi.cu.o.RelWithDebInfo.cmake:280 (message):
     463      Error generating file
     464      /tmp/root/spack-stage/spack-stage-magma-2.5.3-2djtbcccmwffdamfiphremnxnk6nb6hw/spack-build/CMakeFiles/magma.dir/magmablas/./magma_generated_zgemv_fermi.cu.o
     465
     466
  >> 467    make[2]: *** [CMakeFiles/magma.dir/build.make:137: CMakeFiles/magma.dir/magmablas/magma_generated_zgemv_fermi.cu.o] Error 1
...
```

@stomov @luszczek @G-Ragghianti @scottwittenburg @shahzebsiddiqui
